code: /** @format */var axios=require("axios");var baseUrl="http://localhost:8080/api/inventory";export var getItems=function getItems(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};export var getItem=function getItem(id){return axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));};export var updateItem=function updateItem(id,item){return axios({method:"PUT",url:"".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),data:{productName:item.productName,quantity:item.quantity,price:item.price,createdAt:item.createdAt},headers:{Authorization:"","Content-Type":"application/json"}});};export var createItem=function createItem(item){return axios({method:"POST",url:"".concat(baseUrl),data:{productName:item.productName,quantity:item.quantity,price:item.price,createdAt:item.createdAt},headers:{Authorization:"","Content-Type":"application/json"}});};
